page.title: 17LIVING IN PORLOCK
page.content: My mother in law has lived in Porlock for over 50 years.She used to be cook at Allerford House in the late twenties and married a skilled motor mechanic and chauffeur.for most of their married life they lived in a 3 storeyed terraced cottage on Porlock Hill built earlier for Tannery workers.There were few home comforts, no bathroom an outside lavatory and one cold water tap.Water was heated in the boiler for washing and baths in a hip bath in front of the living room fire.A bathroom was installed by the landlord about 7 years ago.Now 81 Kate finds carrying shopping up the hill hard work.She remembers picking 'worts' with her children to sell to provide extras - life on her pension is easier.Her philosophy in life is 'good neighbourliness'.
